aisles

/There are total 134 aisles in the data. The aisle with most n is "fresh vegetabes", with 150609 items./

#Question2
```{r}
aisles %>%
  count(aisle, sort = TRUE)%>%
  filter(n > 10000)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = aisles, y = n))+
  geom_bar()

```
